title: Reincarnated As The Son Of A Vicious Lord! ~When I Was Having Fun Learning Magic, I Had To Get Rid Of My Stigma~!
alternative_title: Akutoku Ryoushu no Musuko ni Tensei!? ~ Tanoshiku Mahou wo Manandeitara, Omei wo Henjou Shitemashita ~ ; 悪徳領主の息子に転生！？～楽しく魔法を学んでいたら、汚名を返上してました～ ; Akutoku Ryoushu no Musuko ni Tensei!? ~ Tanoshiku Mahou wo Manandeitara, Omei wo Henjou Shitemashita ~ ; ¡Reencarnado Como El Hijo De Un Noble Corrupto! ¡~Cuando me estaba divirtiendo aprendiendo magia, tuve que deshacerme de mi estigma~!
status: Akutoku Ryoushu no Musuko ni Tensei!? ~ Tanoshiku Mahou wo Manandeitara, Omei wo Henjou Shitemashita ~ ; 悪徳領主の息子に転生！？～楽しく魔法を学んでいたら、汚名を返上してました～ ; Akutoku Ryoushu no Musuko ni Tensei!? ~ Tanoshiku Mahou wo Manandeitara, Omei wo Henjou Shitemashita ~ ; ¡Reencarnado Como El Hijo De Un Noble Corrupto! ¡~Cuando me estaba divirtiendo aprendiendo magia, tuve que deshacerme de mi estigma~!
description:
Description :
        I am Owen Pepper, the heir of a Noble family. To begin with, there are two kinds of people in this world. The aristocracy, winners from birth, and the rest of the losers, the cattle. I am a winner, of course. Bwahahaha. Livestock, you can work hard for me today. It is the only thing you lot are good for! I have been reincarnated as a tr*sh aristocrat. My father was a villainous lord. And his son, Owen, has been deeply influenced by his father and has grown up to be a fat, incompetent boy! If this continues, my future is in jeopardy. … But I do not care about that! “I heard that there is magic in this world. If we are going to go to all this trouble, let us try to master magic!” And if you are having fun learning magic, you will soon be able to break the stigma! (taken of NovelUpdates)
